attributes.action: ask the Department of Health to publish a "Health Events Calendar" for 2008
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In past years the Department of Health has created a very useful calendar of health promotion events (search on their website for "Events Calendar" to see the 2007 version).

The Department of Health has chosen not to continue this into 2008. For many smaller organisations, this calendar is an important way of promoting their campaigns to a wide audience of health promotion professionals and private sector bodies, and we would like to see it reinstated for 2008 and beyond.
